mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_audio_course_detail WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY sort
mapper.update: UPDATE t_audio_course_detail SET sort = sort - 1 WHERE course_id = #{courseId} AND sort >= #{startSort}
UPDATE t_audio_course_detail SET sort = sort+1 WHERE course_id = #{courseId} AND sort >= #{startSort}
mapper.select: SELECT his.user_id as id,u.nickname,u.headimg,ud.unit_name,ud.sub_unit_name, count(his.detail_id)as pptCount,SUM(his.usedtime)as usedtime FROM t_audio_history his INNER JOIN t_app_user u ON u.id = his.user_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail ud ON ud.user_id = u.id WHERE his.meet_id = #{meetId} GROUP BY his.user_id
SELECT dt.id,dt.sort,dt.duration from t_meet_audio a, t_audio_course_detail dt where dt.course_id = a.course_id AND a.meet_id=#{meetId}
-- GROUP BY 只在MySQL5.6 以下版本 有作用 SELECT his.user_id FROM t_audio_history his INNER JOIN t_app_user u ON u.id = his.user_id WHERE his.meet_id=#{meetId} GROUP BY his.user_id
